alert.note: Alert for Simpson (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 24 at 6:05PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Simpson County through 645 PM CDT... At 605 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Union, or near Pinola, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Pinola around 610 PM CDT. Mendenhall around 625 PM CDT. Martinville around 630 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include D`Lo and Braxton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until midnight CDT for central Mississippi.
